summary.span: 表示数据的内存中缓存。

span.span: Represents an in-memory cache of data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是从数据源检索的数据的内存中缓存，是 ADO.NET 体系结构的主要组件。The , which is an in-memory cache of data retrieved from a data source, is a major component of the ADO.NET architecture. 包含 对象的集合，这些对象可以与 对象相关联。The consists of a collection of objects that you can relate to each other with objects. 还可以通过使用 和 对象，在 中强制数据完整性。You can also enforce data integrity in the by using the and objects. 有关使用 对象的更多详细信息，请参阅[数据集、数据表和 dataview](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/)。For further details about working with objects, see [DataSets, DataTables, and DataViews](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/). 尽管 对象包含数据，但 允许您通过表层次结构进行导航。Whereas objects contain the data, the allows you to navigate though the table hierarchy. 这些表包含在通过 属性访问的 中。The tables are contained in a accessed through the property. 在访问 对象时，请注意，它们具有条件区分大小写。When accessing objects, note that they are conditionally case sensitive. 例如，如果一个 名为 "mydatatable"，另一个名为 "Mydatatable"，则用于搜索其中一个表的字符串被视为区分大小写。For example, if one is named "mydatatable" and another is named "Mydatatable", a string used to search for one of the tables is regarded as case sensitive. 但是，如果 "mydatatable" 存在并且 "Mydatatable" 不是，则搜索字符串将被视为不区分大小写。However, if "mydatatable" exists and "Mydatatable" does not, the search string is regarded as case insensitive. 有关使用 对象的详细信息，请参阅[创建 DataTable](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/creating-a-datatable)。For more information about working with objects, see [Creating a DataTable](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/creating-a-datatable). 可以将数据和架构作为 XML 文档进行读取和写入。A can read and write data and schema as XML documents. 然后，可以在启用 XML 的任何平台上跨 HTTP 传输数据和架构，并将其用于任何应用程序。The data and schema can then be transported across HTTP and used by any application, on any platform that is XML-enabled. 您可以使用 方法将架构保存为 XML 架构，并使用 方法保存架构和数据。You can save the schema as an XML schema with the method, and both schema and data can be saved using the method. 若要读取同时包含架构和数据的 XML 文档，请使用 方法。To read an XML document that includes both schema and data, use the method. 在典型的多层实现中，用于创建和刷新 ，进而更新原始数据的步骤如下：In a typical multiple-tier implementation, the steps for creating and refreshing a , and in turn, updating the original data are to: 1. 使用 ，使用数据源中的数据生成并填充 中的每个 。Build and fill each in a with data from a data source using a . 2. 通过添加、更新或删除 对象，更改单个 对象中的数据。Change the data in individual objects by adding, updating, or deleting objects. 3. 调用 方法来创建第二个仅具有数据更改的 。Invoke the method to create a second that features only the changes to the data. 4. 调用 的 方法，将第二个 作为参数传递。Call the method of the , passing the second as an argument. 5. 调用 方法，将第二个 中的更改合并到第一个中。Invoke the method to merge the changes from the second into the first. 6. 调用 上的 。Invoke the on the . 或者，调用 取消更改。Alternatively, invoke to cancel the changes. > [!NOTE] > 和 对象从 继承，并支持用于远程处理的 接口。The and objects inherit from , and support the interface for remoting. 这两个对象是唯一可远程处理的 ADO.NET 对象。These are the only ADO.NET objects that can be remoted. > [!NOTE] > 由于已在 中取消了终结器，因此垃圾回收器不会完成从 继承的类。Classes inherited from are not finalized by the garbage collector, because the finalizer has been suppressed in . 派生类可以在其构造函数中调用 方法，以允许垃圾回收器来完成类。The derived class can call the method in its constructor to allow the class to be finalized by the garbage collector. ## Examples 下面的示例包含多个方法，这些方法组合、创建和填充**Northwind**数据库中的 。The following example consists of several methods that, combined, create and fill a from the **Northwind** database. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataSet Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataSet Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataSet Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataSet Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 提交自加载此 或上次调用 以来对其进行的所有更改。

span.span: Commits all the changes made to this since it was loaded or since the last time was called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和 类都具有 方法。Both the and classes have methods. 在 级别调用 会导致调用每个 的 方法。Calling at the level causes the method for each to be called. 同样，对 调用 会导致对 中的每个表调用 。Similarly, invoking on the causes to be called on each table within the . 通过这种方式，可以调用方法的多个级别。In this manner, you have multiple levels at which the method can be invoked. 通过调用 的 ，你可以通过一个调用对所有从属对象（例如，表和行）调用方法。Calling the of the enables you to invoke the method on all subordinate objects (for example, tables and rows) with one call. 对 `DataSet`调用 `AcceptChanges` 时，仍处于编辑模式的任何 对象将会成功完成其编辑。When you call `AcceptChanges` on the `DataSet`, any objects still in edit-mode end their edits successfully. 每个 的 属性也会发生变化;`Added` 和 `Modified` 行将变为 `Unchanged`，并且 `Deleted` 行被删除。The property of each also changes; `Added` and `Modified` rows become `Unchanged`, and `Deleted` rows are removed. 如果 `DataSet` 包含 对象，则调用 `AcceptChanges` 方法还会导致 强制执行。If the `DataSet` contains objects, invoking the `AcceptChanges` method also causes the to be enforced. > [!NOTE] > `AcceptChanges` 和 `RejectChanges` 仅适用于 `DataRow` 的相关更改（即，添加、删除、删除和修改）。`AcceptChanges` and `RejectChanges` only apply to `DataRow` related changes (that is, Add, Remove, Delete, and Modify). 它们不适用于架构或结构更改。They are not applicable to schema or structural changes. > > 如果已使用 DataAdapter 填充 DataSet，则调用 AcceptChange 不会将这些更改复制回数据源中。Calling AcceptChanges will not replicate these changes back to the data source if the DataSet was filled using a DataAdapter. 在此情况下，请改为调用 。In that situation, call instead. 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过 Dataadapter 更新数据源](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/updating-data-sources-with-dataadapters)。See [Updating Data Sources with DataAdapters](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/updating-data-sources-with-dataadapters) for more information. ## Examples 下面的示例将 添加到 中的 。The following example adds a to a in a . 然后对 调用 方法，该方法可与它包含的所有 对象进行级联。The method is then called on the , which cascades to all objects that it contains. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataSet.AcceptChanges#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataSet.AcceptChanges/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataSet.AcceptChanges#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataSet.AcceptChanges/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为了确保返回的 中的结果集的顺序，如果 中的 为空，则将在返回的 `DataTableReader`中将其表示为一个空的结果集。In order to ensure the order of the result sets within the returned , if a within the is empty, it will be represented by an empty result set within the returned `DataTableReader`. ## Examples 此示例是一个控制台应用程序，它创建三个 实例，并将每个实例添加到 中。This example, a Console application, creates three instances and adds each to a . 该示例调用 方法，并显示返回的 的内容。The example calls the method and displays the contents of the returned . 请注意，`DataTableReader` 中的结果集的顺序由作为参数传递的 `DataTable` 实例的顺序控制。Note that the order of the result sets in the `DataTableReader` is controlled by the order of the `DataTable` instances passed as parameters. > [!NOTE] > 此示例演示如何使用 `CreateDataReader`的重载版本之一。This example shows how to use one of the overloaded versions of `CreateDataReader`. 有关可能可用的其他示例，请参阅各个重载主题。For other examples that might be available, see the individual overload topics. remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建一个新的 ，其中包含原始 中具有挂起的更改的所有行的副本。Creates a new that contains a copy of all rows in the original that have pending changes. 如果未更改的行包含与已更改的行中的外键相对应的主键，则关系约束可能导致将其他未更改的行添加到新 中。Relationship constraints can cause additional unchanged rows to be added to the new if the unchanged rows contain primary keys corresponding to foreign keys in the changed rows. 如果原始 中没有具有挂起更改的行，则该方法将返回 `null`。The method returns `null` if there are no rows in the original that have pending changes. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个简单的 ，其中包含一个表、两个列和10个行。The following example creates a simple with one table, two columns, and ten rows. 更改了两个值，并添加了一行。Two values are changed, and one row is added. 更改后的数据的子集使用 方法创建。A subset of the changed data is created using the method. 在协调错误后，会将一个新列添加到子集，从而更改架构。After reconciling errors, a new column is added to the subset, changing the schema. 当调用 方法时，如果将 `missingSchemaAction` 设置为 `MissingSchemaAction.Add`，则新列将添加到原始 对象的架构。When the method is called with the `missingSchemaAction` set to `MissingSchemaAction.Add`, the new column is added to the original object's schema. remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法与调用 相同，只不过只写入主架构。Calling this method is identical to calling , except that only the primary schema is written. 将 XML 作为字符串返回，因此需要比 将 XML 写入文件的开销更多。 returns XML as a string, and therefore requires more overhead than to write XML to a file. 如果使用架构推理构建 ，并使用 XML 或 Web 服务对其进行序列化，则列排序可能会更改。If you build a using schema inference and serialize it using XML or Web services, the column ordering may change. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 和 ，然后以 XML 格式显示架构。The following example creates a and , and then displays the schema in XML format. summary.span: 通过所提供的 ，用某个数据源的值填充 。

span.span: Fills a with values from a data source using the supplied .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供一种方法，用来用数据填充单个 ，并从 实例中检索数据。The method provides a technique for filling a single with data, retrieved from an instance. 此方法提供相同的功能，但允许您将 `IDataReader` 中的多个结果集加载到一个 `DataSet`内的多个表中。This method provides the same functionality, but allows you to load multiple result sets from an `IDataReader` into multiple tables within a `DataSet`. 如果 `DataSet` 已经包含行，则从数据源传入的数据与现有行合并。If the `DataSet` already contains rows, the incoming data from the data source is merged with the existing rows. `Load` 方法可用于几种常见方案，它们都围绕从指定数据源获取数据并将其添加到当前数据容器（在本例中为 `DataSet`）。The `Load` method can be used in several common scenarios, all centered around getting data from a specified data source and adding it to the current data container (in this case, a `DataSet`). 这些方案描述了 `DataSet`的标准用法，描述了其更新和合并行为。These scenarios describe standard usage for a `DataSet`, describing its update and merge behavior. `DataSet` 使用单个主数据源同步或更新。A `DataSet` synchronizes or updates with a single primary data source. `DataSet` 跟踪更改，允许与主数据源同步。The `DataSet` tracks changes, allowing synchronization with the primary data source. 此外，`DataSet` 可以接受来自一个或多个辅助数据源的增量数据。In addition, a `DataSet` can accept incremental data from one or more secondary data sources. `DataSet` 不负责跟踪更改，以允许与辅助数据源同步。The `DataSet` isn't responsible for tracking changes in order to allow synchronization with the secondary data source. 假设有这两个假设数据源，用户可能需要以下行为之一：Given these two hypothetical data sources, a user is likely to require one of the following behaviors: - 从主数据源中初始化 `DataSet`。Initialize `DataSet` from a primary data source. 在这种情况下，用户想要使用主数据源中的值初始化空 `DataSet`。In this scenario, the user wants to initialize an empty `DataSet` with values from the primary data source. 修改一个或多个 DataTable 的内容。One or more DataTable's contents are modified. 稍后，用户打算将更改传播回主数据源。Later the user intends to propagate changes back to the primary data source. - 保留更改并从主数据源重新同步。Preserve changes and re-synchronize from the primary data source. 在这种情况下，用户希望将 `DataSet` 填充到前面的方案中，并执行与主数据源的增量同步，同时保留在 `DataSet`中所做的修改。In this scenario, the user wants to take the `DataSet` filled in the previous scenario and perform an incremental synchronization with the primary data source, preserving modifications made in the `DataSet`. - 来自辅助数据源的增量数据馈送。Incremental data feed from secondary data sources. 在这种情况下，用户想要合并一个或多个辅助数据源的更改，并将这些更改传播回主数据源。In this scenario, the user wants to merge changes from one or more secondary data sources, and propagate those changes back to the primary data source. `Load` 方法可以实现所有这些方案。The `Load` method makes all these scenarios possible. 此方法允许您指定加载选项参数，以指示 中的行与正在加载的行合并的方式。This method allows you to specify a load option parameter, indicating how rows already in a combine with rows being loaded. 下表描述了 枚举提供的三个加载选项。The following table describes the three load options provided by the enumeration. 在每种情况下，说明指示传入数据中行的主键与现有行的主键匹配时的行为。In each case, the description indicates the behavior when the primary key of a row in the incoming data matches the primary key of an existing row. |Load 选项Load Option|说明Description| |-----------------|-----------------| |`PreserveChanges`（默认值）`PreserveChanges` (default)|用传入行的值更新行的原始版本。Updates the original version of the row with the value of the incoming row.| |`OverwriteChanges`|用传入行的值更新行的当前版本和原始版本。Updates the current and original versions of the row with the value of the incoming row.| |`Upsert`|用传入行的值更新行的当前版本。Updates the current version of the row with the value of the incoming row.| 通常，`PreserveChanges` 和 `OverwriteChanges` 选项适用于用户需要在主数据源中同步 `DataSet` 及其更改的情况。In general, the `PreserveChanges` and `OverwriteChanges` options are intended for scenarios in which the user needs to synchronize the `DataSet` and its changes with the primary data source. `Upsert` 选项有助于聚合一个或多个辅助数据源中的更改。The `Upsert` option facilitates aggregating changes from one or more secondary data sources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供一种方法，用来用数据填充单个 ，并从 实例中检索数据。The method provides a technique for filling a single with data, retrieved from an instance. 此方法提供相同的功能，但允许您将 中的多个结果集加载到一个 内的多个表中。This method provides the same functionality, but allows you to load multiple result sets from an into multiple tables within a . > [!NOTE] > 如果传入 `reader` 中的任何源数据列是计算列，则加载操作将失败，并 。The load operation will fail with an if any of the source data columns in the incoming `reader` are computed columns. `loadOption` 参数允许你指定导入的数据与现有数据交互的方式，并且可以是 枚举中的任何值。The `loadOption` parameter allows you to specify how you want the imported data to interact with existing data, and can be any of the values from the enumeration. 有关使用此参数的详细信息，请参阅 方法的文档。See the documentation for the method for more information on using this parameter. `tables` 参数可以指定 实例的数组，指示与从读取器加载的每个结果集对应的表的顺序。The `tables` parameter allows you to specify an array of instances, indicating the order of the tables corresponding to each result set loaded from the reader. 方法使用来自源数据读取器的单个结果集中的数据填充每个提供的 实例。The method fills each supplied instance with data from a single result set from the source data reader. 在每个结果集之后， 方法移动到读取器中的下一个结果集，直到没有更多的结果集。After each result set, the method moves on to the next result set within the reader, until there are no more result sets. 此方法的名称解析方案与后跟 类的 方法相同。The name resolution scheme for this method is the same as that followed by the method of the class. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个新的 ，将两个 实例添加到 ，然后使用 方法填充 ，并从包含两个结果集的 中检索数据。The following example creates a new , adds two instances to the , and then fills the using the method, retrieving data from a that contains two result sets. 最后，该示例在控制台窗口中显示表的内容。Finally, the example displays the contents of the tables in the console window. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供一种方法，用来用数据填充单个 ，并从 实例中检索数据。The method provides a technique for filling a single with data, retrieved from an instance. 此方法提供相同的功能，但允许您将 `IDataReader` 中的多个结果集加载到一个 `DataSet`内的多个表中。This method provides the same functionality, but allows you to load multiple result sets from an `IDataReader` into multiple tables within a `DataSet`. > [!NOTE] > 如果传入 `reader` 中的任何源数据列是计算列，则加载操作将失败，并 。The load operation will fail with an if any of the source data columns in the incoming `reader` are computed columns. `loadOption` 参数允许你指定导入的数据与现有数据交互的方式，并且可以是 枚举中的任何值。The `loadOption` parameter allows you to specify how you want the imported data to interact with existing data, and can be any of the values from the enumeration. 有关使用此参数的详细信息，请参阅 方法的文档。See the documentation for the method for more information on using this parameter. 使用 `tables` 参数可以指定表名称的数组，指示与从读取器加载的每个结果集对应的表的顺序。The `tables` parameter allows you to specify an array of table names, indicating the order of the tables corresponding to each result set loaded from the reader. `Load` 方法尝试在 `DataSet` 中查找与在表名称数组中找到的名称相匹配的表，按顺序排列。The `Load` method attempts to find a table within the `DataSet` matching the name found in the array of table names, in order. 如果找到匹配的表，则将使用当前结果集的内容加载该表。If a matching table is found, that table is loaded with the content of the current result set. 如果未找到匹配的表，则使用表名数组中提供的名称创建一个表，并从结果集中推断新表的架构。If no matching table is found, a table is created using the name supplied in the array of table names, and the new table's schema is inferred from the result set. 在每个结果集之后，`Load` 方法移动到读取器中的下一个结果集，直到没有更多的结果集。After each result set, the `Load` method moves on to the next result set within the reader, until there are no more result sets. 与 `DataSet`关联的默认命名空间（如果有）与每个新创建的 `DataTable`相关联。The default namespace associated with `DataSet`, if any, is associated with each newly created `DataTable`. 此方法的名称解析方案与后跟 类的 方法相同。The name resolution scheme for this method is the same as that followed by the method of the class. ## Examples 下面的控制台应用程序示例首先使用 `Load` 方法创建表，并将数据从读取器加载到 中。The following Console application example first creates tables and loads data from a reader into a , using the `Load` method. 然后，该示例将表添加到 ，并尝试使用 中的数据填充表。The example then adds tables to a and attempts to fill the tables with data from a . 在此示例中，由于传递到 `Load` 方法的参数指示不存在的表名，因此 `Load` 方法会创建一个新表来匹配作为参数传递的名称。In this example, because the parameters passed to the `Load` method indicate a table name that does not exist, the `Load` method creates a new table to match the name passed as a parameter. 加载数据后，该示例会在控制台窗口中显示其所有表的内容。Once the data has been loaded, the example displays the contents of all its tables in the Console window. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供一种方法，用来用数据填充单个 ，并从 实例中检索数据。The method provides a technique for filling a single with data, retrieved from an instance. 此方法提供相同的功能，但允许您将 中的多个结果集加载到一个 内的多个表中。This method provides the same functionality, but allows you to load multiple result sets from an into multiple tables within a . > [!NOTE] > 如果传入 `reader` 中的任何源数据列是计算列，则加载操作将失败，并 。The load operation will fail with an if any of the source data columns in the incoming `reader` are computed columns. `loadOption` 参数允许你指定导入的数据与现有数据交互的方式，并且可以是 枚举中的任何值。The `loadOption` parameter allows you to specify how you want the imported data to interact with existing data, and can be any of the values from the enumeration. 有关使用此参数的详细信息，请参阅 方法的文档。See the documentation for the method for more information on using this parameter. `errorHandler` 参数是一个 委托，该委托引用在加载数据的过程中发生错误时调用的过程。The `errorHandler` parameter is a delegate that refers to a procedure that is called when an error occurs while loading data. 传递给过程的 参数提供了属性，这些属性可用于检索有关所发生错误的信息、当前数据行以及要填充的 的信息。The parameter passed to the procedure provides properties that allow you to retrieve information about the error that occurred, the current row of data, and the being filled. 使用此委托机制（而不是更简单的 try/catch 块），可以确定错误，处理情况，并根据需要继续处理。Using this delegate mechanism, rather than a simpler try/catch block, allows you to determine the error, handle the situation, and continue processing if you like. 参数提供 属性：将此属性设置为 `true`，以指示已处理错误并希望继续处理;将属性设置为 "`false`"，指示要暂停处理。The parameter supplies a property: set this property to `true` to indicate that you have handled the error and wish to continue processing; set the property to `false` to indicate that you wish to halt processing. 请注意，将属性设置为 `false` 会导致触发问题的代码引发异常。Be aware that setting the property to `false` causes the code that triggered the problem to throw an exception. `tables` 参数可以指定 实例的数组，指示与从读取器加载的每个结果集对应的表的顺序。The `tables` parameter allows you to specify an array of instances, indicating the order of the tables corresponding to each result set loaded from the reader. 方法使用来自源数据读取器的单个结果集中的数据填充每个提供的 实例。The method fills each supplied instance with data from a single result set from the source data reader. 在每个结果集之后， 方法移动到读取器中的下一个结果集，直到没有更多的结果集。After each result set, the method moves on to the next result set within the reader, until there are no more result sets. 此方法的名称解析方案与后跟 类的 方法相同。The name resolution scheme for this method is the same as that followed by the method of the class. ## Examples 下面的示例将一个表添加到 ，然后尝试使用 方法从包含不兼容架构的 中加载数据。The following example adds a table to a , and then attempts to use the method to load data from a that contains an incompatible schema. 此示例使用 委托来调查并处理错误，而不是捕获此错误。Rather than trapping the error, this example uses a delegate to investigate and handle the error. 输出显示在控制台窗口中。The output is displayed in the console window. summary.span: 将 对象数组合并到当前的 中。

span.span: Merges an array of objects into the current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于合并两个大体类似架构的 对象。The method is used to merge two objects that have largely similar schemas. 通常在客户端应用程序上使用合并，以将数据源中的最新更改合并到现有 中。A merge is typically used on a client application to incorporate the latest changes from a data source into an existing . 这允许客户端应用程序使用数据源中的最新数据进行刷新 。This allows the client application to have a refreshed with the latest data from the data source. 通常在一系列过程的末尾调用 方法，这些过程涉及验证更改、协调错误、使用更改更新数据源，最后刷新现有 。The method is typically called at the end of a series of procedures that involve validating changes, reconciling errors, updating the data source with the changes, and finally refreshing the existing . 在客户端应用程序中，通常有一个按钮，用户可以单击该按钮来收集更改的数据并对其进行验证，然后再将其发送回中间层组件。In a client application, it is common to have a single button that the user can click that gathers the changed data and validates it before sending it back to a middle-tier component. 在此方案中，首先调用 方法。In this scenario, the method is first invoked. 该方法将返回第二个针对验证和合并进行优化 。That method returns a second optimized for validating and merging. 此第二个 对象只包含已更改的 和 对象，导致原始 的子集。This second object contains only the and objects that were changed, resulting in a subset of the original . 此子集通常较小，因此更有效地传递回中间层组件。This subset is generally smaller and thus more efficiently passed back to a middle-tier component. 然后，中间层组件使用存储过程中的更改来更新原始数据源。The middle-tier component then updates the original data source with the changes through stored procedures. 然后，中间层可以发回包含原始数据的新 和数据源中的最新数据（再次运行原始查询），也可以将其从数据源中所做的任何更改发送回。The middle tier can then send back either a new that includes original data and the latest data from the data source (by running the original query again), or it can send back the subset with any changes that have been made to it from the data source. （例如，如果数据源自动创建唯一的主键值，则这些值可以传播回客户端应用程序。）在任一情况下，返回的 都可以与 方法一起合并回客户端应用程序的原始 。(For example, if the data source automatically creates unique primary key values, these values can be propagated back to the client application.) In either case, the returned can be merged back into the client application's original with the method. 调用 方法时，将比较两个 对象的架构，因为架构可能已更改。When the method is called, the schemas of the two objects are compared because it is possible that the schemas may have been changed. 例如，在企业对企业方案中，可能已通过自动化过程将新列添加到了 XML 架构。For example, in a business-to-business scenario, new columns may have been added to an XML schema by an automated process. 如果源 包含目标中缺少的架构元素（添加 对象），则可以通过将 `missingSchemaAction` 参数设置为 `MissingSchemaAction.Add`来将架构元素添加到目标。If the source contains schema elements (added objects) that are missing in the target, the schema elements can be added to the target by setting the `missingSchemaAction` argument to `MissingSchemaAction.Add`. 在这种情况下，合并的 包含添加的架构和数据。In that case, the merged contains the added schema and data. 合并架构后，数据将合并。After merging schemas, the data is merged. 在将新的源 合并到目标时， 值为 `Unchanged`、`Modified`或 `Deleted` 的任何源行都将与具有相同的主键值的目标行匹配。When merging a new source into the target, any source rows with a value of `Unchanged`, `Modified`, or `Deleted` are matched to target rows with the same primary key values. 值为 `Added` 的源行与新源行的主键值相同的新目标行匹配。Source rows with a value of `Added` are matched to new target rows with the same primary key values as the new source rows. 在合并过程中，将禁用约束。During a merge, constraints are disabled. 如果在合并结束时无法启用任何约束，则会生成 ，并在禁用约束时保留合并的数据。If any constraints cannot be enabled at the end of a merge, a is generated and the merged data is retained while the constraints are disabled. 在这种情况下， 属性设置为 `false`，所有无效行都标记为 "错误"。In this case, the property is set to `false`, and all rows that are invalid are marked in error. 在尝试将 属性重置为 `true`之前，必须解决这些错误。The errors must be resolved before attempting to reset the property to `true`.

In either case, the returned can be merged back into the client application's original with the method. 调用 方法时，将比较两个 对象的架构，因为架构可能已更改。When the method is called, the schemas of the two objects are compared because it is possible that the schemas may have been changed. 例如，在企业对企业方案中，可能已通过自动化过程将新列添加到了 XML 架构。For example, in a business-to-business scenario, new columns may have been added to an XML schema by an automated process. 如果源 包含目标中缺少的架构元素（添加 对象），则可以通过将 `missingSchemaAction` 参数设置为 `MissingSchemaAction.Add`来将架构元素添加到目标。If the source contains schema elements (added objects) that are missing in the target, the schema elements can be added to the target by setting the `missingSchemaAction` argument to `MissingSchemaAction.Add`. 在这种情况下，合并的 包含添加的架构和数据。In that case, the merged contains the added schema and data. 合并架构后，数据将合并。After merging schemas, the data is merged. 在将新的源 合并到目标时， 值为 `Unchanged`、`Modified`或 `Deleted` 的任何源行都将与具有相同的主键值的目标行匹配。When merging a new source into the target, any source rows with a value of `Unchanged`, `Modified`, or `Deleted` are matched to target rows with the same primary key values. `DataRowState` 值为 `Added` 的源行与新源行的主键值相同的新目标行匹配。Source rows with a `DataRowState` value of `Added` are matched to new target rows with the same primary key values as the new source rows. 在合并过程中，将禁用约束。During a merge, constraints are disabled. 如果在合并结束时无法启用任何约束，则会生成 ，并在禁用约束时保留合并的数据。If any constraints cannot be enabled at the end of merge, a is generated and the merged data is retained while the constraints are disabled. 在这种情况下， 属性设置为 `false`，所有无效行都标记为 "错误"。In this case, the property is set to `false`, and all rows that are invalid are marked in error. 在尝试将 属性重置为 `true`之前，必须解决这些错误。The errors must be resolved before attempting to reset the property to `true`. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个简单的 ，其中包含一个表、两个列和10个行。The following example creates a simple with one table, two columns, and ten rows. 创建与第一个 相同的第二个。A second is created that is identical to the first. 向第二个表添加两行，然后将其合并到 中。Two rows are added to the second table, which is then merged into the . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataSet.Merge3 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataSet.Merge3 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataSet.Merge3 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataSet.Merge3 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

error. 在尝试将 属性重置为 `true`之前，必须解决这些错误。The errors must be resolved before attempting to reset the property to `true`. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个简单的 ，其中包含一个表、两个列和10个行。The following example creates a simple with one table, two columns, and ten rows. 更改了两个值，并添加了一行。Two values are changed, and one row is added. 更改后的数据的子集使用 方法创建。A subset of the changed data is created using the method. 在协调错误后，会将一个新列添加到子集，从而更改架构。After reconciling errors, a new column is added to the subset, changing the schema. 当调用 方法时，如果将 `missingSchemaAction` 设置为 `MissingSchemaAction.Add`，则新列将添加到原始 对象的架构。When the method is called with the `missingSchemaAction` set to `MissingSchemaAction.Add`, the new column is added to the original object's schema. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于合并两个大体类似架构的 对象。The method is used to merge two objects that have largely similar schemas. 通常在客户端应用程序上使用合并，以将数据源中的最新更改合并到现有 中。A merge is typically used on a client application to incorporate the latest changes from a data source into an existing . 这允许客户端应用程序使用数据源中的最新数据进行刷新 。This allows the client application to have a refreshed with the latest data from the data source. 通常在一系列过程的末尾调用 方法，这些过程涉及验证更改、协调错误、使用更改更新数据源，最后刷新现有 。The method is typically called at the end of a series of procedures that involve validating changes, reconciling errors, updating the data source with the changes, and finally refreshing the existing . 对于客户端应用程序，通常有一个按钮，用户可以单击该按钮来收集更改的数据并对其进行验证，然后再将其发送回中间层组件。iOn a client application, it is common to have a single button that the user can click that gathers the changed data and validates it before sending it back to a middle-tier component. 在此方案中，首先调用 方法。In this scenario, the method is first invoked. 该方法将返回第二个针对验证和合并进行优化 。That method returns a second optimized for validating and merging. 此第二个 对象只包含已更改的 和 对象，导致原始 的子集。This second object contains only the and objects that were changed, resulting in a subset of the original . 此子集通常较小，因此更有效地传递回中间层组件。This subset is generally smaller, and thus more efficiently passed back to a middle-tier component. 然后，中间层组件使用存储过程中的更改来更新原始数据源。The middle-tier component then updates the original data source with the changes through stored procedures. 然后，中间层可以发回包含原始数据的新 和数据源中的最新数据（再次运行原始查询），也可以将其从数据源中所做的任何更改发送回。The middle tier can then send back either a new that includes original data and the latest data from the data source (by running the original query again), or it can send back the subset with any changes that have been made to it from the data source. （例如，如果数据源自动创建唯一的主键值，则这些值可以传播回客户端应用程序。）在任一情况下，返回的 都可以与 方法一起合并回客户端应用程序的原始 。(For example, if the data source automatically creates unique primary key values, these values can be propagated back to the client application.) In either case, the returned can be merged back into the client application's original with the method. 调用 方法时，将比较两个 对象的架构，因为架构可能已更改。When the method is called, the schemas of the two objects are compared because it is possible that the schemas may have been changed. 例如，在企业对企业方案中，可能已通过自动化过程将新列添加到了 XML 架构。For example, in a business-to-business scenario, new columns may have been added to an XML schema by an automated process. 如果源 包含目标中缺少的架构元素（添加 对象），则可以通过将 `missingSchemaAction` 参数设置为 `MissingSchemaAction.Add`来将架构元素添加到目标。If the source contains schema elements (added objects) that are missing in the target, the schema elements can be added to the target by setting the `missingSchemaAction` argument to `MissingSchemaAction.Add`. 在这种情况下，合并的 包含添加的架构和数据。In that case, the merged contains the added schema and data. 合并架构后，数据将合并。After merging schemas, the data is merged. 在将新的源 合并到目标时， 值为 `Unchanged`、`Modified`或 `Deleted` 的任何源行都将与具有相同的主键值的目标行匹配。When merging a new source into the target, any source rows with a value of `Unchanged`, `Modified`, or `Deleted` are matched to target rows with the same primary key values. `DataRowState` 值为 `Added` 的源行与新源行的主键值相同的新目标行匹配。Source rows with a `DataRowState` value of `Added` are matched to new target rows with the same primary key values as the new source rows. 在合并过程中，将禁用约束。During a merge, constraints are disabled. 如果在合并结束时无法启用任何约束，则会生成 ，并在禁用约束时保留合并的数据。If any constraints cannot be enabled at the end of merge, a is generated and the merged data is retained while the constraints are disabled. 在这种情况下， 属性设置为 `false`，所有无效行都标记为 "错误"。In this case, the property is set to `false`, and all rows that are invalid are marked in error. 在尝试将 属性重置为 `true`之前，必须解决这些错误。The errors must be resolved before attempting to reset the property to `true`. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个简单的 ，其中包含一个表、两个列和10个行。The following example creates a simple with one table, two columns, and ten rows. 创建的第二个 与第一个相同，不同之处在于向表中添加了新的 `DataColumn`。A second is created that is nearly identical to the first except that a new `DataColumn` is added to the table. 向第二个表添加两行，然后将其合并到 ，并将 `preserveChanges` 参数设置为 `false`，并将 `missingSchemaAction` 参数设置为 `MissingSchemaAction.Add`。Two rows are added to the second table, which is then merged into the with the `preserveChanges` argument set to `false`, and the `missingSchemaAction` argument set to `MissingSchemaAction.Add`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供一种方法，用于仅从 XML 文档读取数据或将数据和架构读入 ，而 方法只读取架构。The method provides a way to read either data only, or both data and schema into a from an XML document, whereas the method reads only the schema. 若要读取数据和架构，请使用包含 `mode` 参数的 `ReadXML` 重载之一，并将其值设置为 "`ReadSchema`"。To read both data and schema, use one of the `ReadXML` overloads that includes the `mode` parameter, and set its value to `ReadSchema`. 请注意， 和 方法的情况都是相同的。Note that the same is true for the and methods, respectively. 若要从 `DataSet`写入 XML 数据或架构和数据，请使用 `WriteXml` 方法。To write XML data, or both schema and data from the `DataSet`, use the `WriteXml` method. 若要只写入架构，请使用 `WriteXmlSchema` 方法。To write just the schema, use the `WriteXmlSchema` method. > [!NOTE] > 如果读取或写入 `DataRow` 中的列类型以实现 但未实现 ，则会引发 。An will be thrown if a column type in the `DataRow` being read from or written to implements and does not implement . 如果指定了内嵌架构，则在加载数据之前，使用内联架构来扩展现有的关系结构。If an in-line schema is specified, the in-line schema is used to extend the existing relational structure prior to loading the data. 如果存在任何冲突（例如，使用不同的数据类型定义的同一表中的同一列），则会引发异常。If there are any conflicts (for example, the same column in the same table defined with different data types) an exception is raised. 如果未指定内联架构，根据 XML 文档的结构，将根据需要通过推理扩展关系结构。If no in-line schema is specified, the relational structure is extended through inference, as necessary, according to the structure of the XML document. 如果无法通过推理扩展架构以便公开所有数据，则会引发异常。If the schema cannot be extended through inference in order to expose all data, an exception is raised. > [!NOTE] > 当在序列化的 XML 中转义类似于（"_"）的合法 XML 字符时，`DataSet` 不会将 XML 元素与其相应的 `DataColumn` 或 `DataTable` 相关联。The `DataSet` does not associate an XML element with its corresponding `DataColumn` or `DataTable` when legal XML characters like ("_") are escaped in the serialized XML. `DataSet` 本身只是转义 XML 元素名称中的非法 XML 字符，因此只能使用同一个。The `DataSet` itself only escapes illegal XML characters in XML element names and hence can only consume the same. 当转义 XML 元素名称中的法律字符时，将在处理时忽略元素。When legal characters in XML element name are escaped, the element is ignored while processing. 如果 的 XML 架构包括 `targetNamespace`，则可能无法读取数据，并且在调用 以使用包含无限定命名空间的元素的 XML 加载 时可能会遇到异常。If the XML Schema for a includes `targetNamespace`, data may not be read, and you may encounter exceptions when calling to load the with XML that contains elements with no qualifying namespace. 若要读取未限定的元素，请在 XML 架构中将 `elementFormDefault` 设置为 "合格"，如下面的示例所示。To read unqualified elements, set `elementFormDefault` equal to "qualified" in your XML Schema, as the following example demonstrates. ``` ``` > [!NOTE] > 如果你的 的架构包含相同命名空间中 具有相同名称但类型不同的元素，则当你尝试通过指定 `XmlReadMode.ReadSchema`将架构读入 时，将引发异常。If the schema for your contains elements of the same name, but different type, in the same namespace, an exception is thrown when you attempt to read the schema into the with by specifying `XmlReadMode.ReadSchema`. 如果使用 .NET Framework 版本1.0，则不会发生此异常。This exception does not occur if you are using .NET Framework version 1.0. ## Examples 下面的示例首先创建一个简单的 ，其中包含一个 、两列和10行。The following example first creates a simple with one , two columns, and ten rows. 通过调用 方法将 架构和数据写入磁盘。The schema and data are written to disk by invoking the method. 将创建第二个 ，并使用 方法来填充架构和数据。A second is created and the method is used to fill it with schema and data. the `DataSet`, use the `WriteXml` method. 若要只写入架构，请使用 `WriteXmlSchema` 方法。To write just the schema, use the `WriteXmlSchema` method. > [!NOTE] > 如果读取或写入 `DataRow` 中的列类型以实现 但未实现 ，则会引发 。An will be thrown if a column type in the `DataRow` being read from or written to implements and does not implement . 如果指定了内嵌架构，则在加载数据之前，使用内联架构来扩展现有的关系结构。If an in-line schema is specified, the in-line schema is used to extend the existing relational structure prior to loading the data. 如果存在任何冲突（例如，使用不同的数据类型定义的同一表中的同一列），则会引发异常。If there are any conflicts (for example, the same column in the same table defined with different data types) an exception is raised. 如果未指定内联架构，根据 XML 文档的结构，将根据需要通过推理扩展关系结构。If no in-line schema is specified, the relational structure is extended through inference, as necessary, according to the structure of the XML document. 如果无法通过推理扩展架构以便公开所有数据，则会引发异常。If the schema cannot be extended through inference in order to expose all data, an exception is raised. > [!NOTE] > 当在序列化的 XML 中转义类似于（"_"）的合法 XML 字符时，`DataSet` 不会将 XML 元素与其相应的 `DataColumn` 或 `DataTable` 相关联。The `DataSet` does not associate an XML element with its corresponding `DataColumn` or `DataTable` when legal XML characters like ("_") are escaped in the serialized XML. `DataSet` 本身只是转义 XML 元素名称中的非法 XML 字符，因此只能使用同一个。The `DataSet` itself only escapes illegal XML characters in XML element names and hence can only consume the same. 当转义 XML 元素名称中的法律字符时，将在处理时忽略元素。When legal characters in XML element name are escaped, the element is ignored while processing. 如果 的 XML 架构包括 `targetNamespace`，则可能无法读取数据，并且在调用 以使用包含无限定命名空间的元素的 XML 加载 时可能会遇到异常。If the XML Schema for a includes `targetNamespace`, data may not be read, and you may encounter exceptions when calling to load the with XML that contains elements with no qualifying namespace. 若要读取未限定的元素，请在 XML 架构中将 `elementFormDefault` 设置为 "合格"，如下面的示例所示。To read unqualified elements, set `elementFormDefault` equal to "qualified" in your XML Schema as the following example demonstrates. ``` ``` 继承自 类的类包括 和 类。Classes that inherit from the class include the and classes. > [!NOTE] > 如果你的 的架构包含相同命名空间中 具有相同名称但类型不同的元素，则当你尝试通过指定 `XmlReadMode.ReadSchema`将架构读入 时，将引发异常。If the schema for your contains elements of the same name, but different type, in the same namespace, an exception is thrown when you attempt to read the schema into the with by specifying `XmlReadMode.ReadSchema`. 如果使用 .NET Framework 版本1.0，则不会发生此异常。This exception does not occur if you are using .NET Framework version 1.0. ## Examples 下面的示例首先创建一个简单的 ，其中包含一个 、两列和10行。The following example first creates a simple with one , two columns, and ten rows. 通过调用 方法将 架构和数据写入磁盘。The schema and data are written to disk by invoking the method. 将创建第二个 ，并使用 方法来填充架构和数据。A second is created and the method is used to fill it with schema and data. following example demonstrates. ``` ``` > [!NOTE] > 如果你的 的架构包含相同命名空间中 具有相同名称但类型不同的元素，则当你尝试通过指定 `XmlReadMode.ReadSchema`将架构读入 时，将引发异常。If the schema for your contains elements of the same name, but remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供一种方法，用于仅从 XML 文档读取数据或将数据和架构读入 ，而 方法只读取架构。The method provides a way to read either data only, or both data and schema into a from an XML document, whereas the method reads only the schema. 若要读取数据和架构，请使用包含 `mode` 参数的 `ReadXML` 重载之一，并将其值设置为 "`ReadSchema`"。To read both data and schema, use one of the `ReadXML` overloads that includes the `mode` parameter, and set its value to `ReadSchema`. 请注意， 和 方法的情况都是相同的。Note that the same is true for the and methods, respectively. 若要从 `DataSet`写入 XML 数据或架构和数据，请使用 `WriteXml` 方法。To write XML data, or both schema and data from the `DataSet`, use the `WriteXml` method. 若要只写入架构，请使用 `WriteXmlSchema` 方法。To write just the schema, use the `WriteXmlSchema` method. > [!NOTE] > 如果读取或写入 `DataRow` 中的列类型以实现 但未实现 ，则会引发 。An will be thrown if a column type in the `DataRow` being read from or written to implements and does not implement . 如果指定了内嵌架构，则在加载数据之前，使用内联架构来扩展现有的关系结构。If an in-line schema is specified, the in-line schema is used to extend the existing relational structure prior to loading the data. 如果存在任何冲突（例如，使用不同的数据类型定义的同一表中的同一列），则会引发异常。If there are any conflicts (for example, the same column in the same table defined with different data types) an exception is raised. 如果未指定内联架构，根据 XML 文档的结构，将根据需要通过推理扩展关系结构。If no in-line schema is specified, the relational structure is extended through inference, as necessary, according to the structure of the XML document. 如果无法通过推理扩展架构以便公开所有数据，则会引发异常。If the schema cannot be extended through inference in order to expose all data, an exception is raised. > [!NOTE] > 当在序列化的 XML 中转义类似于（"_"）的合法 XML 字符时，`DataSet` 不会将 XML 元素与其相应的 `DataColumn` 或 `DataTable` 相关联。The `DataSet` does not associate an XML element with its corresponding `DataColumn` or `DataTable` when legal XML characters like ("_") are escaped in the serialized XML. `DataSet` 本身只是转义 XML 元素名称中的非法 XML 字符，因此只能使用同一个。The `DataSet` itself only escapes illegal XML characters in XML element names and hence can only consume the same. 当转义 XML 元素名称中的法律字符时，将在处理时忽略元素。When legal characters in XML element name are escaped, the element is ignored while processing. 如果 的 XML 架构包括 `targetNamespace`，则可能无法读取数据，并且在调用 以使用包含无限定命名空间的元素的 XML 加载 时可能会遇到异常。If the XML Schema for a includes a `targetNamespace`, data may not be read, and you may encounter exceptions when calling to load the with XML that contains elements with no qualifying namespace. 若要读取未限定的元素，请在 XML 架构中将 `elementFormDefault` 设置为 "合格"，如下面的示例所示。To read unqualified elements, set `elementFormDefault` equal to "qualified" in your XML Schema as the following example demonstrates. ``` ``` > [!NOTE] > 如果你的 的架构包含相同命名空间中 具有相同名称但类型不同的元素，则当你尝试通过指定 `XmlReadMode.ReadSchema`将架构读入 时，将引发异常。If the schema for your contains elements of the same name, but different type, in the same namespace, an exception is thrown when you attempt to read the schema into the with by specifying `XmlReadMode.ReadSchema`. 如果使用 .NET Framework 版本1.0，则不会发生此异常。This exception does not occur if you are using .NET Framework version 1.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下， 在 Web 服务和远程处理方案中序列化其架构和实例数据。A serializes its schema and instance data by default in Web services and remoting scenarios. 将类型化 `DataSet` 的 属性设置为 会导致从序列化有效负载中排除架构信息。Setting the property of a typed `DataSet` to causes schema information to be excluded from the serialization payload. 只有类型化 `DataSet`支持 。 is supported only for a typed `DataSet`. 对于非类型化 `DataSet` 此属性只能设置为 。For an un-typed `DataSet` this property can only be set to . 仅当未修改基础类型化 `DataTables`、`DataRelations` 和 `Constraints` 的架构信息时，才应使用 。 should only be used in cases where the schema information of the underlying typed `DataTables`, `DataRelations` and `Constraints` has not been modified. 如果发生了修改，则应使用 序列化完整的架构信息。If modifications have occurred, complete schema information should be serialized with . .NET Framework 或更高版本的2.0 版支持 。 is supported in version 2.0 of the .NET Framework or later. 如果设置 ，则仅序列化 上存在的顶级运行时属性。When is set, only the top level runtime properties present on the are serialized. 此外，仅当它们碰巧不同于默认值时，才会序列化它们。In addition, they are serialized only if they happen to be different from the default values. 不会序列化 `Tables`、`Relations` 或 `Constraints`。None of the `Tables`, `Relations` or `Constraints` are serialized. 序列化的运行时属性包括 、、、、和 。The serialized runtime properties include , , , , , and . 将序列化这些属性，以确保保留总体运行时数据完整性。These properties are serialized to make sure that overall runtime data integrity is preserved.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `WriteXml` 方法提供一种方法，用于将数据（或从 中的数据和架构）写入 XML 文档，而 方法只写入架构。The `WriteXml` method provides a way to write either data only, or both data and schema from a into an XML document, whereas the method writes only the schema. 若要同时编写数据和架构，请使用包含 `mode` 参数的重载之一，并将其值设置为 `WriteSchema`。To write both data and schema, use one of the overloads that includes the `mode` parameter, and set its value to `WriteSchema`. 请注意， 和 方法的情况都是相同的。Note that the same is true for the and methods, respectively. 若要将 XML 数据或架构和数据都读入到 `DataSet`，请使用 `ReadXml` 方法。To read XML data, or both schema and data into the `DataSet`, use the `ReadXml` method. 若要仅读取架构，请使用 `ReadXmlSchema` 方法。To read just the schema, use the `ReadXmlSchema` method. > [!NOTE] > 如果读取或写入 `DataRow` 中的列类型以实现 但未实现 ，则会引发 。An will be thrown if a column type in the `DataRow` being read from or written to implements and does not implement . ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 对象。The following example creates a object. 然后，将对象与 方法一起使用以写入 XML 文档。The object is then used with the method to write an XML document. remarks.format: ## Remarks `WriteXml` 方法提供一种方法，用于将数据（或从 中的数据和架构）写入 XML 文档，而 方法只写入架构。The `WriteXml` method provides a way to write either data only, or both data and schema from a into an XML document, whereas the method writes only the schema. 若要同时编写数据和架构，请将 `mode` 参数设置为 `WriteSchema`。To write both data and schema, set the `mode` parameter to `WriteSchema`. 请注意， 和 方法的情况都是相同的。Note that the same is true for the and methods, respectively. 若要将 XML 数据或架构和数据都读入到 `DataSet`，请使用 `ReadXml` 方法。To read XML data, or both schema and data into the `DataSet`, use the `ReadXml` method. 若要仅读取架构，请使用 `ReadXmlSchema` 方法。To read just the schema, use the `ReadXmlSchema` method. > [!NOTE] > 如果读取或写入 `DataRow` 中的列类型以实现 但未实现 ，则会引发 。An will be thrown if a column type in the `DataRow` being read from or written to implements and does not implement . ## Examples 下面的示例首先创建一个简单的 ，其中包含一个 、两列和10行。The following example first creates a simple with one , two columns, and ten rows. 通过调用 方法将 架构和数据写入磁盘。The schema and data are written to disk by invoking the method. 将创建第二个 ，并使用 方法来填充架构和数据。A second is created and the method is used to fill it with schema and data.
